[Imperial Command - Lower](/imperialCommandLower/) |culture= |attributes = |quests= |sells= |resting= |companion= |loot= |guid= |internalname= }} '''Verzano''' is a character in {{poe1}} and {{poe2}}. ## Background A man stands in the corner of the warehouse, directing traffic. Gems wink from the many rings on his fingers as he points and waves at the laborers. His silk clothes, though finely embroidered, aren't new - you notice a couple mended seams around the shoulders and a discreet patch on one elbow. Maestre Verzano hails from [Ancenze](/ancenze/) and is currently operating the Vailian Trading Company in [Defiance Bay](/defianceBay/). He boasts of being a part of the largest confederation of merchants and traders from the Republics, but his actual mercantile skills are less than stellar. ## Interactions ## ={{poe1}} = {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = [At All Costs](/atAllCosts/) |quests_involved = |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [At All Costs](/atAllCosts/): Verzano starts the quest by asking you to make a delivery. ## ={{poe2}} = * If Verzano is not killed during [At All Costs](/atAllCosts/), he can be found sweeping the floors of [Imperial Command](/imperialCommand/), lower floor in [The Brass Citadel](/theBrassCitadel/). You can only "talk" to him via chatter dialogue. Having left the Vailian Trading Company in Defiance Bay after the debacle, he was welcomed into the RDC and promoted to "overseer of Sanitary Engineering". Though the Rauatians are stern, he is proud of his position, and is glad to still be alive. ## Gallery Mestre Verzano.png | Mestre Verzano in Defiance Bay. PE2 Verzano.png | In the Imperial Command
